citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process on July 27, 2021 from
3 PM to 3:30 PM. During this time the inspector waited for 30 minutes, called licensee's phone number leaving a
message, and knocked on doors.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission  of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process on July 27, 2021 from 
3 PM to 3:30 PM. During this time the inspector waited for 30 minutes, called licensee's phone number leaving a 
message, and knocked on doors. 
 
 
 
End Section
